title: Retail Management: Retail Technology and Security
headline: Learn how to prevent loss and crime in a retail environment with this retail technology and security management course.
description: This free online Retail Management course teaches you about retail technology and security. In the retail market today there are many technologies available for the prevention of stock loss, the maximisation of sales, and improving customer service experiences. This free online course will teach you about the use of innovative retail technologies like RFID (Radio Frequency Identification Devices) and Customer Relation Management (CRM) systems.
courseDescription:
This course will begin by introducing you to important advancements in retail technology. You will first learn about radio frequency identification (RFID) its uses. The course will also cover Customer Relationship Management systems and how they can be used to your company's advantage. You will also learn how modern shoppers use their mobile phones before purchasing anything, and will be guided through the advantages and disadvantages of technology in retail.

You will then learn the information that employers should ask for on a job application form to make sure that you attract the right job applicants. The course will discuss the benefits of hiring security as well as teach you the practices and procedures that can help prevent retail crime. You will also study the measures that should be taken in the event of a crime. Finally, you will learn important techniques for coping with aggressive customers and customer complaints.

Managing a retail store requires specialised knowledge and skills. This free retail management course is designed to teach you these skills in a clear and simple manner. By the end of this course you will have a much stronger understanding of how to prevent crime in your establishment and how to better manage your customer relations through technology. So, check out the course today and start maximising the potential of your retail store in just a few hours.
